Enclosing class:
TestManager
private class TestManager.PricePanelRecommendationAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Thread

PricePanelRecommendationAnalyzer is a threaded check of recommendations for contracts and posts them to the Price Panel.

Author:
J.R. Titko

TestManager.PricePanelRecommendationAnalyzer

public TestManager.PricePanelRecommendationAnalyzer(Contract contract,
                                                    int term,
                                                    PricePanel.PriceTableModel callback,

Create an analyzer for a contract and term.

Parameters:
contract - the contract to get the recommendation for
term - short, medium, or long term recommendation
callback - the callback location to populate with the recommendation
row - the row in the table to update
